text: Abahakanyi bazajyanwa muri Jahanamu mu matsinda, kugeza ubwo bazayigeraho maze imiryango yayo igafunguka, nuko abarinzi bayo bavuge bati “Ese ntimwagezweho n’intumwa zibaturutsemo, zibasomera amagambo (Ayat) ya Nyagasani wanyu, ndetse zinababurira kuzahura n’uyu munsi wanyu?” Bazavuga bati “Yego! Ahubwo imvugo y’ibihano yabaye impamo ku bahakanyi (ari bo twe).”
